headline.main: AFRICA BATTLE ON; British Advance Under Cover of Artillery Fire and Air Bombings

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Oct. 31 -- The Imperial Eighth Army was reported driving home a major attack against General Field Marshal Erwin Rommel's anchor positions near the Mediterranean coast tonight under cover of a rolling artillery barrage and sweeping air assaults in which American and British planes ranged from the desert battleground to Axis reinforcement bases on Crete.
abstract: Brit 8th Army drives against Rommel forces under artillery barrage aided by US-Brit planes; Axis reptd reinforced from Malema airdrome, Crete; heavy fighting reptd, El Alamein line; Rommel and Brit Lt Gen Montgomery tactics discussed; Malta has 48-hr air-raid respite

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
